#include <avr/pgmspace.h>  // Needed to store stuff in Flash using PROGMEM
#include "FastLED.h"       // Fastled library to control the LEDs

// How many leds are connected?
#define NUM_LEDS 256

// Define the Data Pin
#define DATA_PIN 2  // Connected to the data pin of the first LED strip

// Define the array of leds
CRGB leds[NUM_LEDS];

// Create the array of retro arcade characters and store it in Flash memory
const long Bear[] PROGMEM =
{
0x040004, 0x080108, 0x000304, 0x000405, 0x000405, 0x4D5758, 0x565658, 0x515153, 0x5A5559, 0x4F4A4E, 0x575759, 0x010103, 0x000102, 0x000304, 0x0A0106, 0x060002,

const long Coin1[] PROGMEM =
{

void setup() {
FastLED.addLeds<NEOPIXEL,DATA_PIN>(leds, NUM_LEDS);  // Init of the Fastled library
FastLED.setBrightness(255);
}

void loop() {
  
FastLED.clear();
for(int i = 0; i < NUM_LEDS; i++) {
    leds[i] = pgm_read_dword(&(Coin1[i]));  // Read array from Flash
  }
FastLED.show();
delay(500);

FastLED.clear();
for(int i = 0; i < NUM_LEDS; i++) {
    leds[i] = pgm_read_dword(&(Coin2[i]));  // Read array from Flash
  }
FastLED.show();
delay(500);

FastLED.clear();
for(int i = 0; i < NUM_LEDS; i++) {
    leds[i] = pgm_read_dword(&(Coin3[i]));  // Read array from Flash
  }
FastLED.show();
delay(500);

FastLED.clear();
for(int i = 0; i < NUM_LEDS; i++) {
    leds[i] = pgm_read_dword(&(Coin4[i]));  // Read array from Flash
  }
FastLED.show();
delay(500);
}
